game_description: Participate in the space race championship to unlock all 37 circuits and 3 difficulty levels. Possibility to design your ships with an infinite number of colors and a choice of 100 combinations of different models that you can acquire over the course of the races by increasing their powers. 90 FPS mode for Quest 2. The demo version gives access to the first 7 circuits. Good game !
review_1: The speed button needs to be the trigger not pushing forward on the stick. Afraid it will break irreplaceable controller so have to uninstall. The drops are fun but not while pushing on a stick and slowing down for not pushing hard enough or something. Unintuitive controls for oculus. The sound doesnt fit the epic visuals for me. 1st person driver view would be nicer i think. Too many vehicle models. Would prefer just color slider with one cool model unless model makes a difference in game but it didnt seem to. Instructions are hidden in Info? Uninstalled before I found them. Could easily be a top classic 5 star game with simple change in controls. Otherwise really like the idea and the graphics are awesome.
review_2: I don't even know... The idea is very good, the execution is still controversial. No control clues, the very first card, the image just swirls around. First time dizzy in VR.
